title: Boston Bruins ' revenue 2005 to 2019
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2007/08 to 2008/09, roughly constant from 2008/09 to 2009/10, slightly increasing from 2009/10 to 2010/11, roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2011/12, and finally slightly decreasing from 2011/12 to 2012/13.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009/10 and 2010/11.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 129.0 was reached at Year 2011/12
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 97.0 was reached at Year 2007/08
